name: Riley Exploration Permian, Inc.
description: Riley Exploration Permian, Inc. is an independent oil and natural gas company focused on the acquisition, exploration, and development of oil and natural gas reserves in the Permian Basin region of West Texas and New Mexico. The company was founded with the vision of leveraging advanced drilling techniques and innovative operational practices to maximize recovery from its extensive asset portfolio. Riley Exploration is committed to operational excellence, sustainability, and responsible resource management, ensuring that its activities are conducted in an environmentally conscious manner. The company utilizes a range of modern technologies, including horizontal drilling and hydraulic fracturing, to efficiently access and produce hydrocarbons. With a strong emphasis on safety and community engagement, Riley Exploration aims to create long-term value for its shareholders while contributing positively to the communities in which it operates. The firm also places a high priority on maintaining a robust balance sheet and generating free cash flow, which allows for strategic reinvestment and dividend distribution to its investors. As the energy landscape evolves, Riley Exploration remains focused on adapting to market conditions and pursuing opportunities that align with its strategic objectives.
